LanguageData.Bow_Momu.label: momu bow
LanguageData.Bow_Momu.description: A powerful bow made of specially treated wood and metal reinforcements. It lacks the range of a greatbow, but fires devastatingly powerful arrows.
LanguageData.Bow_Momu.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.Arrow_Momu.label: momu arrow
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Momu_Blade.label: momu blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Momu_Blade.description: This unique knife has its handle grown organically from special bramblewood trees. It's rumored to give Momu courage in battle.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Momu_Blade.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Momu_Blade.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Momu_Blade.tools.2.label: edge
